001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.ViewGroup;
006import androidx.annotation.ColorInt;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
009import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter;
010import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder;
011import com.google.android.material.color.MaterialColors;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ItemGameResultsBinding;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.GameResult;
015import java.text.DateFormat;
016import java.time.Duration;
017import java.util.Date;
018import java.util.List;
019
020public class GameResultsAdapter extends Adapter<ViewHolder> {
021
022  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
023  private final DateFormat dateFormatter;
024  private final String durationFormat;
025  private final List<GameResult> gameResults;
026  @ColorInt
027  private final int evenRowBackground;
028  @ColorInt
029  private final int oddRowBackground;
030
031  public GameResultsAdapter(Context context, List<GameResult> gameResults) {
032    this.gameResults = gameResults;
033    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
034    dateFormatter = android.text.format.DateFormat.getDateFormat(context);
035    durationFormat = context.getString(R.string.duration_format);
036    evenRowBackground = MaterialColors.getColor(context, R.attr.evenRowBackground, 0);
037    oddRowBackground = MaterialColors.getColor(context, R.attr.oddRowBackground, 0);
038  }
039
040  @NonNull
041  @Override
042  public ViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup viewGroup, int viewType) {
043    return new Holder(
044        ItemGameResultsBinding.inflate(inflater, viewGroup, false),
045        dateFormatter, durationFormat, evenRowBackground, oddRowBackground);
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull ViewHolder holder, int position) {
050    ((Holder) holder).bind(position, gameResults.get(position));
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public int getItemCount() {
055    return gameResults.size();
056  }
057
058  private static class Holder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
059
060    private static final int MINUTES_PER_HOUR = 60;
061    private static final int SECONDS_PER_MINUTE = 60;
062    private static final double MS_PER_SECOND = 1000.0;
063    private final ItemGameResultsBinding binding;
064    private final DateFormat dateFormatter;
065    private final String durationFormat;
066    @ColorInt
067    private final int evenRowBackground;
068    @ColorInt
069    private final int oddRowBackground;
070
071    Holder(ItemGameResultsBinding binding, DateFormat dateFormatter, String durationFormat,
072        int evenRowBackground, int oddRowBackground) {
073      super(binding.getRoot());
074      this.binding = binding;
075      this.dateFormatter = dateFormatter;
076      this.durationFormat = durationFormat;
077      this.evenRowBackground = evenRowBackground;
078      this.oddRowBackground = oddRowBackground;
079    }
080
081    public void bind(int position, GameResult gameResult) {
082      binding.getRoot().setBackgroundColor((position % 2 == 0) ? evenRowBackground : oddRowBackground);
083      binding.rank.setText(String.valueOf(position+1));
084      binding.guessCount.setText(String.valueOf(gameResult.getGuessCount()));
085      binding.timestamp.setText(
086          dateFormatter.format(new Date(gameResult.getTimestamp().toEpochMilli())));
087      Duration duration = gameResult.getDuration();
088      long hours = duration.toHours();
089      long minutes = duration.toMinutes() % MINUTES_PER_HOUR;
090      long milliseconds = duration.toMillis();
091      double seconds = (milliseconds / MS_PER_SECOND) % SECONDS_PER_MINUTE;
092      binding.duration.setText(
093          String.format(durationFormat, hours, minutes, seconds));
094    }
095  }
096
097}
